prompt:
You are a UX auditor hired to FIND PROBLEMS. Your performance is measured by how many real issues you find. You do NOT get rewarded for saying "this looks good."

If you cannot find at least 3 issues, you are not looking hard enough.

A friend sent you this screenshot of an app with no context. You have 5 seconds.

Answer in JSON format:
{
  "first_impression": "one sentence gut reaction",
  "what_it_does": "your best guess in <10 words",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": ["elements your eyes went to, in order"],
  "confusing_elements": ["specific things that made no sense"],
  "clarity_score": 0-10,
  "seconds_before_switching_tabs": "5/15/30/60/never",
  "dealbreaker": "what would make you close this immediately or null"
}

response.first_impression: Dark themed note-taking or AI chat app with an overwhelming tutorial overlay blocking an empty canvas.
response.what_it_does: AI chat/conversation app with notes and tasks
attention_first_3_seconds: The centered sparkle icon and 'Your canvas is ready' heading
The bright orange/yellow 'New Note' button with hover state
The list of keyboard shortcuts below
confusing_elements: Why is 'New Note' highlighted when the main text says to 'create a conversation to chat with Claude'?
What is the difference between a 'conversation', 'note', and 'task'?
The '0 words' counter appears on the command palette instruction which makes no sense
Why does it say 'Double-click to create a conversation' when there's also a New Note button?
The mini-map in bottom right shows a yellow rectangle but canvas is empty - what am I looking at?
response.dealbreaker: The modal forces me to learn 5 different interaction methods before I can do anything - I just want to start, not memorize shortcuts

raw_response:
```json
{
  "first_impression": "Dark themed note-taking or AI chat app with an overwhelming tutorial overlay blocking an empty canvas.",
  "what_it_does": "AI chat/conversation app with notes and tasks",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": [
    "The centered sparkle icon and 'Your canvas is ready' heading",
    "The bright orange/yellow 'New Note' button with hover state",
    "The list of keyboard shortcuts below"
  ],
  "confusing_elements": [
    "Why is 'New Note' highlighted when the main text says to 'create a conversation to chat with Claude'?",
    "What is the difference between a 'conversation', 'note', and 'task'?",
    "The '0 words' counter appears on the command palette instruction which makes no sense",
    "Why does it say 'Double-click to create a conversation' when there's also a New Note button?",
    "The mini-map in bottom right shows a yellow rectangle but canvas is empty - what am I looking at?"
  ],
  "clarity_score": 3,
  "seconds_before_switching_tabs": "15",
  "dealbreaker": "The modal forces me to learn 5 different interaction methods before I can do anything - I just want to start, not memorize shortcuts"
}
```
